seo.title: YakShaver - Record issues & let AI instantly assign them to the right team

pageBlocks.byLine: Don't waste time writing bug reports. The YakShaver AI agent analyses recordings, generates the task, and allocates it to the correct team instantly. {Save hours} of frustration with YakShaver
pageBlocks.buttonSubtext: No credit card required + 14-day free trial

issueReportText: I just encountered a problem in {TinaCloud}. When i was attempting to upload files larger than 5MB, the {application} {crashes} entirely.
I am on the latest version of {Chrome}. This impacts user function significantly, I would classify it as {Priority 1}.
I recalled {Matt and Adam} had a similar issue before. I'll need to inform the {operations team} this bug could affect their experience negatively
leftHandSide.issueReportSummarySubtitle: YakShaver Records and transcribes video in real-time, processing information for immediate analysis.

rightHandSide.issueReportSummarySubtitle: Work items will be generated in real-time, assign and inform relevant parties, ensuring immediate tracking and management of tasks.

CardAndImageItem.Description: Found a bug or have an idea? Record your screen and voice with any app you like
YakShaver watches your video, turns what you say into text, and figures out what's happening.

**YakShaver creates a task, bug report, or feature reques**t in your favourite system (Azure DevOps, GitHub). YakShaver can also send emails.

It will include a great title, description, and tasks plus the original video for additional context.

topLeftBox.title: Work with your favourite software development and collaborative tools

topRightBox.title: Real-Time PBIs
topRightBox.description: Stay updated instantly with alerts when PBIs have been created, assigned, or require follow-up

bottomRightBox.title: Automated task creation: From idea to action
bottomRightBox.description: Unlock the power of automation with generative AI that seamlessly converts videos, audio and screenshares into actionable product backlog items

pageBlocks.title: {Simple, Transparent Pricing}
pageBlocks.desc: Choose the plan that's right for your team and start saving time on issue reporting today

addOns.title: Credit Pack
addOns.description: Need a top up? Add some credits

pageBlocks.bottomBox:
\* The average hourly rate includes salary, benefits, and overhead costs.

\*\* Our Value Reclaimed Calculation: Based on customer data, YakShaver reduces issue reporting time by 90% - from 5 hours weekly to just 30 minutes.

questions.question: Is YakShaver easy to use for non-technical teams?
questions.answer: Absolutely. YakShaverâ€™s intuitive design makes it easy for anyone, regardless of technical expertise, to report issues and delegate tasks efficiently.

questions.question: Can YakShaver work with my existing systems?
questions.answer: YakShaver can pull your people and project data from multiple systems including, Dynamics 365, Active Directory, Salesforce or even just an excel import! For work item creation, it integrates with Exchange, GitHub, Azure DevOps, Jira, Zendesk and more!

questions.question: Does YakShaver support screen recording?
questions.answer: Yes, YakShaver includes built-in screen recording from Microsoft Teams, making it easy to capture and use visual information when reporting an issue. It can also integrate with standalone screen recorders such as Snagit.

questions.question: What kind of issues can I report with YakShaver?
questions.answer: You can report any type of issue! YakShaver is designed to handle a variety of tasks, bugs or features, and automatically package them into work items with relevant information and send it off to the relevant people.

questions.question: What file formats do you support
questions.answer: Currently, we support .mp4 and .mov video file extensions.

pageBlocks.title: Talk to a YakShaver Expert
pageBlocks.ctaDescription: Evaluating YakShaver for your project? Book a 30-minute call with a YakShaver architect
